comment:
* Jank information to be fed back via {@link OnJankDataListener}.
     * @hide

variables.name: DISPLAY_HAL
variables.comment: Jank not related to SurfaceFlinger or the App

variables.name: JANK_SURFACEFLINGER_DEADLINE_MISSED
variables.comment: SF took too long on the CPU

variables.name: JANK_SURFACEFLINGER_GPU_DEADLINE_MISSED
variables.comment: SF took too long on the GPU

variables.name: JANK_APP_DEADLINE_MISSED
variables.comment: Either App or GPU took too long on the frame

variables.name: PREDICTION_ERROR
variables.comment: Vsync predictions have drifted beyond the threshold from the actual HWVsync

variables.name: SURFACE_FLINGER_SCHEDULING
variables.comment: Latching a buffer early might cause an early present of the frame
